ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] New expansion Beta Open
ygData.msgSnippet: You get this before or after you submit your user/pass?? I imagine you ve done a fair amount of torubleshooting to try and fix it.  what all have you tried?
ygData.messageBody:
You get this before or after you submit your user/pass??
 
I imagine you've done a fair amount of torubleshooting to try and fix it.  what all have you tried?
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, August 06, 2005 8:31 PM
Subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] New expansion Beta Open

I can't even get into the normal game. I keep trying and all I get is 1017 all the time. I may have to cancel my accounts if this keeps up. No point in paying for a game I can't play.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-08-04, 20:12:00 you wrote: =======

>Well I'd love to tell ya if I could ever get into the damn thing!  It's till not working for me!
>  From the small bit I did see, they've added 2 new tabs to the Inventory window.  One says Evolving Weapons, and the other one says Monster Alts.  The latest patch message I saw said that the monster alts was not working yet.  And some NPCs whose character models are not in zone yet are replaced by the standard human model.  They call this model "Doug".
>
>
>Wulfric
>
